amendment.description: Amendment to the Solomon amendment (A001) sought to make Spanish the official language of Puerto Rico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the Solomon amendment with language declaring Spanish is the official language of Puerto Rico.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gutierrez to the Solomon amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 13 - 406, 1 Present (Roll no. 28).
